article_title: Broward Health board votes to demote acting CEO
article_text:

article_metadata.description: The board of Florida's Broward Health has voted to demote its interim CEO back to chief operating officer amid repeated complaints of an unproductive, disorganized atmosphere and lack of long-term physician contracts, according to the Sun Sentinel.
